org.hps.recon.ecal.cluster

Class DualThresholdCosmicClusterDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.recon.ecal.cluster.ClusterDriver
        • org.hps.recon.ecal.cluster.DualThresholdCosmicClusterDriver

  • public class DualThresholdCosmicClusterDriver
extends ClusterDriver
    This is a specialized Driver to use the dual threshold cosmic clustering algorithm. It really only sets up the tight hit collection name for the clustering algorithm.
    See Also:
    ClusterDriver, DualThresholdCosmicClusterer
